definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: B:Would you please transfer me to the production department?
It just so happened that this wise little quail was the Bodhisatta the Enlightenment Being.
sentences.chinese: 原來，這隻聰明的鵪鶉是位菩薩轉生。

sentences.english: After his death from old age, he was reborn in Sheogh as an Incubus.
sentences.chinese: 當他年老死後，他轉生爲謝爾戈的一個夜魔。

sentences.english: You have come here voluntarily to this blue green jewel and you have incarnated into the physical tenacities of flesh.
sentences.chinese: 們原本是自願者來到這藍綠星球，轉生物理的。

sentences.english: Can destroy the body, and soul can reincarnate or transition.
sentences.chinese: 肉體可滅，而靈魂可以轉生或轉型。

sentences.english: If after you died, you could be reincarnated as any color dragon, which would you choose?
sentences.chinese: 如果你死後可以轉生爲龍，你選擇哪種顏色的龍？

sentences.english: Metempsychosis , he said, is what the ancient Greeks called it.
sentences.chinese: “轉生，”他說，是古希臘人的說法。

definition: not the least bit concerned/completely indifferent
universally shocking/to offend the whole of society
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
with a will, you can achieve anything (idiom); cf 精誠所至，金石為開|精诚所至，金石为开[jing1 cheng2 suo3 zhi4 , jin1 shi2 wei4 kai1]
